document.full_text: forces loyal to libyan leader muammar gaddafi were shelling the rebel-held city of misrata on monday, targeting residential areas, a rebel spokesman said.
document.title: pro-gaddafi forces shelling libya's misrata: rebels
lines_and_colors: forces loyal to libyan leader muammar gaddafi were shelling the rebel-held city of misrata on monday, targeting residential areas, a rebel spokesman said.
